summary: A test suite that validates the token‑swapper plugin’s ability to synthesize permutation gates, checking both abstract and concrete synthesis paths, handling all permutations, impossible syntheses, disconnected qubit layouts, and confirming the plugin’s registration within the known plugin catalog.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and comprehensive functionality of the token‑swapper synthesis component for quantum circuit compilation, ensuring it correctly generates permutation operations under diverse conditions and integrates properly with the plugin framework.
